name: Lumberjack and Wolves
description: Was planning on expanding this even more, but got bored after a while, so just releasing a simple version of this. WASD and space for movement. Press E to throw banana, which the wolves will eat and stop attacking you for a while. Cut down trees to gain boost in speed. Wolves spawn periodically. Was a test on procedural generation, animations, models, 3d graphics and sounds.
